selected_skills.name: read_diagram_value
selected_skills.purpose: Interpret the diagram to understand the geometric configuration and extract necessary values.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract values from the diagram, such as side lengths or areas of geometric shapes.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the area of square C using the given areas of squares A and B.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to perform numeric calculations based on the relationships derived from the Pythagorean theorem.

selected_skills.name: map_value_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: Map the calculated area of square C to the correct multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to match the calculated numeric value to one of the provided multiple-choice options.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer according to the required output format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the answer as 'Answer: ...' with the correct option label.
